Home --> Documentations --> PJMEDIA Reference

Samples: Encoding and Decoding

This sample shows how to use codec.

This file is pjsip-apps/src/samples/encdec.c

31 #include <pjlib.h>
32 #include <pjmedia.h>
33 #include <pjmedia-codec.h>
34 
35 #define THIS_FILE "encdec.c"
36 
37 static const char *desc =
38  " encdec \n"
39  " \n"
40  " PURPOSE: \n"
41  " Encode input WAV with a codec, and decode the result to another WAV \n"
42  "\n"
43  "\n"
44  " USAGE: \n"
45  " encdec codec input.wav output.wav \n"
46  "\n"
47  "\n"
48  " where:\n"
49  " codec Set the codec name. \n"
50  " input.wav Set the input WAV filename. \n"
51  " output.wav Set the output WAV filename. \n"
52 
53  "\n"
54 ;
55 
56 //#undef PJ_TRACE
57 //#define PJ_TRACE 1
58 
59 #ifndef PJ_TRACE
60 # define PJ_TRACE 0
61 #endif
62 
63 #if PJ_TRACE
64 # define TRACE_(expr) PJ_LOG(4,expr)
65 #else
66 # define TRACE_(expr)
67 #endif
68 
69 
70 static void err(const char *op, pj_status_t status)
71 {
72  char errmsg[PJ_ERR_MSG_SIZE];
73  pj_strerror(status, errmsg, sizeof(errmsg));
74  PJ_LOG(3,("", "%s error: %s", op, errmsg));
75 }
76 
77 #define CHECK(op) do { \
78  status = op; \
79  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) { \
80  err(#op, status); \
81  return status; \
82  } \
83  } \
84  while (0)
85 
86 static pjmedia_endpt *mept;
87 static unsigned file_msec_duration;
88 
89 static pj_status_t enc_dec_test(const char *codec_id,
90  const char *filein,
91  const char *fileout)
92 {
93  pj_pool_t *pool;
94  pjmedia_codec_mgr *cm;
95  pjmedia_codec *codec;
96  const pjmedia_codec_info *pci;
97  pjmedia_codec_param param;
98  unsigned cnt, samples_per_frame;
99  pj_str_t tmp;
100  pjmedia_port *wavin, *wavout;
101  unsigned lost_pct;
102  unsigned bitstream_size = 0;
103  pj_status_t status;
104 
105 #define T file_msec_duration/1000, file_msec_duration%1000
106 
107  pool = pjmedia_endpt_create_pool(mept, "encdec", 1000, 1000);
108 
109  cm = pjmedia_endpt_get_codec_mgr(mept);
110 
111 #ifdef LOST_PCT
112  lost_pct = LOST_PCT;
113 #else
114  lost_pct = 0;
115 #endif
116 
117  cnt = 1;
118  CHECK( pjmedia_codec_mgr_find_codecs_by_id(cm, pj_cstr(&tmp, codec_id),
119  &cnt, &pci, NULL) );
120  CHECK( pjmedia_codec_mgr_get_default_param(cm, pci, &param) );
121 
122  samples_per_frame = param.info.clock_rate * param.info.frm_ptime / 1000;
123 
124  /* Control VAD */
125  param.setting.vad = 1;
126 
127  /* Open wav for reading */
128  CHECK( pjmedia_wav_player_port_create(pool, filein,
129  param.info.frm_ptime,
130  PJMEDIA_FILE_NO_LOOP, 0, &wavin) );
131 
132  /* Open wav for writing */
133  CHECK( pjmedia_wav_writer_port_create(pool, fileout,
134  param.info.clock_rate,
135  param.info.channel_cnt,
136  samples_per_frame,
137  16, 0, 0, &wavout) );
138 
139  /* Alloc codec */
140  CHECK( pjmedia_codec_mgr_alloc_codec(cm, pci, &codec) );
141  CHECK( pjmedia_codec_init(codec, pool) );
142  CHECK( pjmedia_codec_open(codec, &param) );
143 
144  for (;;) {
145  pjmedia_frame frm_pcm, frm_bit, out_frm, frames[4];
146  pj_int16_t pcmbuf[2048];
147  pj_timestamp ts;
148  pj_uint8_t bitstream[2048];
149 
150  frm_pcm.buf = (char*)pcmbuf;
151  frm_pcm.size = samples_per_frame * 2;
152 
153  /* Read from WAV */
154  if (pjmedia_port_get_frame(wavin, &frm_pcm) != PJ_SUCCESS)
155  break;
156  if (frm_pcm.type != PJMEDIA_FRAME_TYPE_AUDIO)
157  break;;
158 
159  /* Update duration */
160  file_msec_duration += samples_per_frame * 1000 /
161  param.info.clock_rate;
162 
163  /* Encode */
164  frm_bit.buf = bitstream;
165  frm_bit.size = sizeof(bitstream);
166  CHECK(pjmedia_codec_encode(codec, &frm_pcm, sizeof(bitstream),
167  &frm_bit));
168 
169  /* On DTX, write zero frame to wavout to maintain duration */
170  if (frm_bit.size == 0 || frm_bit.type != PJMEDIA_FRAME_TYPE_AUDIO) {
171  out_frm.buf = (char*)pcmbuf;
172  out_frm.size = 160;
173  CHECK( pjmedia_port_put_frame(wavout, &out_frm) );
174  TRACE_((THIS_FILE, "%d.%03d read: %u, enc: %u",
175  T, frm_pcm.size, frm_bit.size));
176  continue;
177  }
178 
179  bitstream_size += (unsigned)frm_bit.size;
180 
181  /* Parse the bitstream (not really necessary for this case
182  * since we always decode 1 frame, but it's still good
183  * for testing)
184  */
185  ts.u64 = 0;
186  cnt = PJ_ARRAY_SIZE(frames);
187  CHECK( pjmedia_codec_parse(codec, bitstream, frm_bit.size, &ts, &cnt,
188  frames) );
189  CHECK( (cnt==1 ? PJ_SUCCESS : -1) );
190 
191  /* Decode or simulate packet loss */
192  out_frm.buf = (char*)pcmbuf;
193  out_frm.size = sizeof(pcmbuf);
194 
195  if ((pj_rand() % 100) < (int)lost_pct) {
196  /* Simulate loss */
197  CHECK( pjmedia_codec_recover(codec, sizeof(pcmbuf), &out_frm) );
198  TRACE_((THIS_FILE, "%d.%03d Packet lost", T));
199  } else {
200  /* Decode */
201  CHECK( pjmedia_codec_decode(codec, &frames[0], sizeof(pcmbuf),
202  &out_frm) );
203  }
204 
205  /* Write to WAV */
206  CHECK( pjmedia_port_put_frame(wavout, &out_frm) );
207 
208  TRACE_((THIS_FILE, "%d.%03d read: %u, enc: %u, dec/write: %u",
209  T, frm_pcm.size, frm_bit.size, out_frm.size));
210  }
211 
212  /* Close wavs */
213  pjmedia_port_destroy(wavout);
214  pjmedia_port_destroy(wavin);
215 
216  /* Close codec */
217  pjmedia_codec_close(codec);
218  pjmedia_codec_mgr_dealloc_codec(cm, codec);
219 
220  /* Release pool */
221  pj_pool_release(pool);
222 
223  printf("Total encoded size: %u bytes\n", bitstream_size);
224  printf("Bitrate: %.3fKbps\n", bitstream_size*8.0/file_msec_duration);
225  return PJ_SUCCESS;
226 }
227 
228 
229 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
230 {
231  pj_caching_pool cp;
232  pj_time_val t0, t1;
233  pj_status_t status;
234 
235  if (argc != 4) {
236  puts(desc);
237  return 1;
238  }
239 
240  CHECK( pj_init() );
241 
242  pj_caching_pool_init(&cp, NULL, 0);
243 
244  CHECK( pjmedia_endpt_create(&cp.factory, NULL, 1, &mept) );
245 
246  /* Register all codecs */
247  CHECK( pjmedia_codec_register_audio_codecs(mept, NULL) );
248 
249  pj_gettimeofday(&t0);
250  status = enc_dec_test(argv[1], argv[2], argv[3]);
251  pj_gettimeofday(&t1);
252  PJ_TIME_VAL_SUB(t1, t0);
253 
254  pjmedia_endpt_destroy(mept);
255  pj_caching_pool_destroy(&cp);
256  pj_shutdown();
257 
258  if (status == PJ_SUCCESS) {
259  puts("");
260  puts("Success");
261  printf("Duration: %ds.%03d\n", file_msec_duration/1000,
262  file_msec_duration%1000);
263  printf("Time: %lds.%03ld\n", t1.sec, t1.msec);
264  }
265 
266  return 0;
267 }
